content.rendered:
2022 World Series Travel Package Rates

Hotel Packages 2 Night/1 Game Packages From3 Night/2 Games Packages From
3-Star Accommodations$2,595$4,915
4-Star Accommodations$2,845$5,305
5-Star Accommodations$3,285$5,955
Contact our sports travel specialists for your custom trip quote.
*Rates are per person in USD based on double occupancy. Single occupancy rates are available. Triple and Quad occupancy may be available. A 25% deposit will hold your spot. The balance will not be due until 90 days prior to departure. Rates include all local and state taxes. Availability and pricing subject to change prior to booking.
